TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActiveDirectorySchema extends System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryPartition

Docs.summary: The ActiveDirectorySchema class represents the schema partition for a particular domain.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed

Docs.param: `true` to release both managed and unmanaged resources; `false` to release only unmanaged resources.
Docs.summary: Releases the managed resources that are used by the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchema"> object and, optionally, releases unmanaged resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The parameter affects only the release of managed resources. Unmanaged resources are always released by this method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection FindAllClasses() cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves all Active Directory Domain Services classes in the schema.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection"> object that contains a collection of <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> objects for the classes that were retrieved.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection FindAllClasses(valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType type) cil managed

Docs.param: One of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType"> members that identifies which type of classes to retrieve.
Docs.summary: Retrieves all Active Directory Domain Services classes in the schema that are of the specified type.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection"> object that contains a collection of <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> objects for the classes that were retrieved.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection FindAllDefunctClasses() cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves all of the defunct Active Directory Domain Services classes in the schema.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection"> object that contains a collection of <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> objects for the classes that were retrieved.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection FindAllDefunctProperties() cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves all of the defunct Active Directory Domain Services properties in the schema.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection"> object that contains a collection of <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty> objects for the properties that were retrieved.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection FindAllProperties() cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves all of the Active Directory Domain Services properties in the schema.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection"> object that contains a collection of <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty> objects for the properties that were retrieved.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection FindAllProperties(valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.PropertyTypes type) cil managed

Docs.param: One of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.PropertyTypes"> members that identifies which type of properties to retrieve.
Docs.summary: Retrieves all of the Active Directory Domain Services properties in the schema of the specified type.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection"> object that contains a collection of <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty> objects for the properties that were retrieved.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass FindClass(string ldapDisplayName) cil managed

Docs.param: The LDAP display name of the class to find.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the class with the specified name.
Docs.returns: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> object that represents the class with the specified name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass FindDefunctClass(string commonName) cil managed

Docs.param: The common name of the defunct class to find.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the defunct class that has the specified common name.
Docs.returns: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"> object that represents the class with the specified common name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty FindDefunctProperty(string commonName) cil managed

Docs.param: The common name of the defunct property to find.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the defunct property that has the specified common name.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> object that represents the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty FindProperty(string ldapDisplayName) cil managed

Docs.param: The LDAP display name of the property to find.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the property with the specified name.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"> object that represents the property with the specified name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchema GetCurrentSchema() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the schema object for the forest that the currently logged-on user is a member of.
Docs.returns: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchema"> object that represents the schema for the domain that the local computer is a member of.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry GetDirectoryEntry() cil managed

Docs.summary: Retrieves a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> object that represents the directory partition.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> object that represents the directory partition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchema GetSchema(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> object that contains the target and credentials to use to retrieve the object. The target of the context must be a forest, directory server, or configuration set.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the schema object for the specified context.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchema"> object that represents the schema for the specified context.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RefreshSchema() cil managed

Docs.summary: Refreshes the schema cache on the client computer.
Gets the schema master role owner.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer"> object that represents the server that is the schema master.
